description:
With a highly adjustable seat, the Kasko is perfect for afternoons of exploring. Thigh braces provide comfortable, secure contact with the deck underside, for greater control and more efficient energy transfer.

  • Lightweight and durable high-density polyethylene construction
  • Ergonomic Flex 4 seat is adjustable to accommodate a wide range of body sizes and shapes
  • Perforated seats with Drytech fabric drains water and dries quickly
  • Recessed deck fittings minimize hang-ups
  • Durable rubber hatches seal out the water to keep your gear dry
  • Rudder can be dropped from the cockpit by releasing the locking mechanism
  • High visibility deck lines help keep you seen on low-light paddles
  • Deck rigging holds spare paddles and safety gear
name: Boréal Designs Kasko Rudder Kayak
